outcome: Hospital systems glitch, compromising patient safety and triggering public outcry.

events.description: Major hospitals report systemic malfunctions in patient data management, threatening lives and disrupting care.
A whistleblower doctor exposes hospital glitches, inciting outrage and waves of protest across the city.
Rumors spread of a hidden bug in BCI affecting healthcare; people demand Council answers and a full audit.
Ongoing health crises lead to street demonstrations calling for new governance and accountability for BCI.
